name: Rothfire Hall
description:
You play as Eve, a college student who along with her friend Sandy is press-ganged into investigating an abandoned mansion. The mansion turns out to be haunted, and you must find your way into its inner sanctum whilst avoiding any potentially transformative mishaps along the way.

 

Originally uploaded to tfgames.site in 2018. See the discussion thread for more info and ending guide: https://tfgames.site/index.php?module=viewgame&id=1695
